com.android.vcard.tests.testutils

Class VCardVerifier

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.android.vcard.tests.testutils.VCardVerifier

  • public class VCardVerifier
extends java.lang.Object

    The class lets users checks that given expected vCard data are same as given actual vCard data. Able to verify both vCard importer/exporter.

    First a user has to initialize the object by calling either initForImportTest(int, int) or initForExportTest(int). "Round trip test" (import -> export -> import, or export -> import -> export) is not supported.
